properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 2:52PM PST until February 2 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, W winds 10 to 20 kt with
gusts to 25 kt and seas 10 to 13 ft. For the Gale Watch, N winds
25 to 30 kt with gusts to 40 kt and seas 13 to 18 ft possible.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM Saturday to 3 AM Sunday.
For the Gale Watch, from late Saturday night through Monday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM SUNDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
